level.heading: Tax-exempt status.
level.text: The Commission and its income, property, transactions, and right to do business shall be exempt from any taxation, direct or indirect, within the District, including any sales, use, franchise, gross sales or receipts, income, personal property, transfer, or excise tax. Contributions to the Fund shall be tax deductible.
